nodes.text: My Ar'krai was a book written by the Bothan politician Borsk Fey'lya, who served the New Republic as Chief of State during the Yuuzhan Vong War. The title of the book was derived from the Bothan concept of ar'krai—a total, unrelenting state of war. At least part of the book was a highly critical look at Human contributions to galactic politics.
My Ar'krai was introduced through a quote by Borsk Fey'lya in the section "The Political Galaxy" of The Essential Atlas (2009).
